actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1056.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7113 to authorize appropriations to the Director of the National Bureau of Standards for fiscal year 1981, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7113 (Funds for the National Bureau of Standards, fiscal year 1981).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 7113 to authorize appropriations to the Director of the National Bureau of Standards for fiscal year 1981, and for other purposes.
